sqlquery.name: BasePerformRole.BaseOn_Condition
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ C1 as RoleDefineID, C700022000 as RoleOnlyID, C700022001 as RoleName, C700022002 as RoleProcessRoleType, C700022003 as RoleDesc, C700022004 as RoleBaseID, C700022005 as RoleBaseSchema, C700022006 as RoleProcessPhaseNo, C700022101 as Assignee, C700022102 as AssigneeID, C700022103 as ProGroup, C700022104 as GroupID, C700022201 as RoleKey, C700022301 as ContextAssignee_FieldID, C700022302 as ContextAssigneeID_FieldID, C700022303 as ContextGroup_FieldID, C700022404 as ContextGroupID_FieldID, C700022501 as TopRoleMatchConditionsDesc /*COUNT*/ from {WF:App_Base_PerformRole} BasePerformRole where $BaseOn_Condition$
